message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, but you get a decent share!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're not giving me enough, I need more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of again!
I'm taking control, you're getting less and less!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet!
